hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VERSION_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: provide it only when releasing to QA otherwise - it is a night build and there is no version name change

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_VMS

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #find the last tag in this branch: LastTag=`git describe --abbrev=0 --tags origin/$BRANCH` majorVersion=$(cut -d "." -f 1 <<< "$VERSION_NAME").$(cut -d "." -f 2 <<< "$VERSION_NAME") #if this is a night build, need to run maven with the last version name: mavenBuildNumber=$(cut -d "." -f 3 <<< "$LastTag") #Inithilize the properties file echo VERSION_NAME=${VERSION_NAME} > ../armBuild.properties #if this is a new release, then #create new tag in Arm repo: if [ $RELEASE_VMS == "1" ]; then git config --global user.name "Jenkins" git config --global user.email devops@audiocodes.com git checkout $BRANCH git pull --rebase origin $BRANCH git tag -a $VERSION_NAME -m "automatic tag" git push origin $VERSION_NAME # Gathering information to UpdateVI GERRIT_PROJECT=`echo $GIT_URL | cut -d/ -f4,5` DATE=`git for-each-ref --format '%(taggerdate)' refs/tags/$VERSION_NAME` AuthorCommitter=`git log --first-parent --pretty=format:"%aN%n%cN" $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | grep -v Jenkins | sort -u | sed s/$/\;/g` RN=`git log --first-parent --pretty=format:"%h - %s" $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | sed s/\"/\'/g` VIS=`git log $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | grep Issue | sed 's/.*: \(VI\|\)//g; s/ .*//g'` #EMAIL=`git log --pretty=format:"%ae%n%ce" $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | sort -u` #create new tag in Arm UI cd .. if [ -d "armUI" ]; then rm -rf armUI; fi git clone ssh://jenkins@gerrit:29418/web-ui/arm armUI cd armUI git tag -a $VERSION_NAME -m "automatic tag" git push origin $VERSION_NAME # Gathering information to UpdateVI from armUI repository too AuthorCommitter+=" "`git log --first-parent --pretty=format:"%aN%n%cN" $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | grep -v Jenkins | sort -u | sed s/$/\;/g` RN+=" "`git log --first-parent --pretty=format:"%h - %s" $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | sed s/\"/\'/g` VIS+=" "`git log $LastTag..$VERSION_NAME | grep Issue | sed 's/.*: \(VI\|\)//g; s/ .*//g'` VIS=`echo $VIS |tr " " "\n" | sort -u` cd ${WORKSPACE} #need to run maven with the new version name: mavenBuildNumber=$(cut -d "." -f 3 <<< "$VERSION_NAME") # Save all UpdateVI information into the properties file echo RN=${RN} >> ../armBuild.properties echo VIS=${VIS} >> ../armBuild.properties echo EMAIL=${EMAIL} >> ../armBuild.properties echo PROJECT=${GERRIT_PROJECT} >> ../armBuild.properties echo DATE=${DATE} >> ../armBuild.properties echo AuthorCommitter=${AuthorCommitter} >> ../armBuild.properties fi echo majorVersion=${majorVersion} >> ../armBuild.properties echo mavenBuildNumber=${mavenBuildNumber} >> ../armBuild.properties #replace backslash with space, because it is not a valid properties file if it includes a backslash char #it save a ".bak" backup file for debug if we will encounter problems sed -i.bak 's/\\/ /g' ../armBuild.properties

org.jenkinsci.plugins.ParameterizedRemot.parameters: NEWTAG=$VERSION_NAME RN=$RN VIS=$VIS EMAIL=$EMAIL PROJECT=$PROJECT DATE=$DATE GERRIT_BRANCH=$BRANCH AuthorCommitter=$AuthorCommitter
